targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu"::tag = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag fill(none)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu"::tag = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag fill(none)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu"::tag = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag fill(none)
select last(uptime) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("available_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s)*-1 AS "IN" FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  and "host" =~ /^$host$/   GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s)*-1 AS "IN" FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  and "host" =~ /^$host$/   GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s)  as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) , "name"  fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s)  as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) , "name"  fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
